p: At both stages, all cases with clinically and laboratory-confirmed dengue using non-structural protein 1 (NS1), IgM antibody capture enzyme-linked immunosorbent assay (MAC-ELISA) and/or reverse transcription polymerase chain reaction (RT-PCR) according to the manufacturer’s instructions [ 17, 18]. The dengue cases included in our study were reported to the official database or the National System for Reportable Diseases (Sistema Nacional de Agravos de Notificação–SINAN).
